Title: Basic Controls
Description: Learn the basic controls to navigate your ship in space.

Steps.Title: Welcome to Codename: Subspace!
Steps.Message: Welcome, Commander! This tutorial will teach you the basic controls. Click 'Continue' when ready.

Steps.Title: Movement Controls
Steps.Message:
Use WASD keys to move your ship:
• W - Forward
• S - Backward
• A - Strafe Left
• D - Strafe Right
• Space - Up
• Shift - Down

Steps.Title: Camera Controls
Steps.Message:
Use the mouse to look around and the Arrow keys + Q/E to rotate your ship:
• Mouse - Look Around
• Arrow Keys - Rotate Ship
• Q/E - Roll
• C - Toggle Camera/Ship Control

Steps.Title: User Interface
Steps.Message:
Important UI keys:
• J - Quest Log
• I - Inventory
• B - Ship Builder
• TAB - Player Status
• H - Toggle Tutorial
• ESC - Pause Menu
• ~ - Testing Console

Steps.Title: Tutorial Complete!
Steps.Message: You've learned the basic controls! Now you're ready to explore the galaxy. Good luck, Commander!
